rukus.text: Wa Laqad Bawwa'na Bani 'Isra'ila Mubawwa'a Sidqin Wa Razaqnahum Mina At-Tayyibati Fama Akhtalafu Hatta Ja'ahumu Al-`Ilmu 'Inna Rabbaka Yaqđi Baynahum Yawma Al-Qiyamati Fima Kanu Fihi Yakhtalifuna
Fa'in Kunta Fi Shakkin Mimma 'Anzalna 'Ilayka Fas'ali Al-Ladhina Yaqra'una Al-Kitaba Min Qablika Laqad Ja'aka Al-Haqqu Min Rabbika Fala Takunanna Mina Al-Mumtarina
Wa La Takunanna Mina Al-Ladhina Kadhabu Bi'ayati Allahi Fatakuna Mina Al-Khasirina
Inna Al-Ladhina Haqqat `Alayhim Kalimatu Rabbika La Yu'uminuna
Wa Law Ja'at/hum Kullu 'Ayatin Hatta Yaraw Al-`Adhaba Al-'Alima
Falawla Kanat Qaryatun 'Amanat Fanafa`aha 'Imanuha 'Illa Qawma Yunis Lamma 'Amanu Kashafna `Anhum `Adhaba Al-Khizyi Fi Al-Hayaati Ad-Dunya Wa Matta`nahum 'Ila Hinin
Wa Law Sha'a Rabbuka La'amana Man Fi Al-'Arđi Kulluhum Jami`aan 'Afa'anta Tukrihu An-Nasa Hatta Yakunu Mu'uminina
Wa Ma Kana Linafsin 'An Tu'umina 'Illa Bi'idhni Allahi Wa Yaj`alu Ar-Rijsa `Ala Al-Ladhina La Ya`qiluna
Qul Anzuru Madha Fi As-Samawati Wa Al-'Arđi Wa Ma Tughni Al-'Ayatu Wa An-Nudhuru `An Qawmin La Yu'uminuna
Fahal Yantaziruna 'Illa Mithla 'Ayyami Al-Ladhina Khalaw Min Qablihim Qul Fantaziru 'Inni Ma`akum Mina Al-Muntazirina
Thumma Nunajji Rusulana Wa Al-Ladhina 'Amanu Kadhalika Haqqaan `Alayna Nunji Al-Mu'uminina
